Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Faience shabti
Description: A grey-green glazed faience shabti with back pillar and plinth. The figure is very finely modelled, the text in the 'T-form'. The tripartite wig is plain but the beard is shown to be plaited. In the left hand is a hoe and the rope of the basket on the back, in the right is a pick.
